org.promasi.shell.playmodes.singleplayerscoremode
Class Story

java.lang.Object
  org.promasi.shell.playmodes.singleplayerscoremode.Story
All Implemented Interfaces:
IValidatable
public class Story
extends java.lang.Object
implements IValidatable

The story contains a series of Projects that the project manager has to go through.

Author:
eddiefullmetal

addProjectModelRelation

public void addProjectModelRelation(Project project,
                                    SdModel model)
Adds an entry to the _projectModelRelations. If an entry for the project exists it removes it and adds the a new.

Parameters:
project - The Project to add as a key to the _projectModelRelations.
model - The SdModel to add as a value to the _projectModelRelations.
